Data: Lee to Ganguly, no run pitches outside off and comes in a little, left alone
Lee to Ganguly, no run full and swinging in, he gets a half stride forward and pushes it towards point
Lee to Ganguly, no run swings in and lands on a fullish length, he defends

Lee to Ganguly, no run loss of concentration there, Lee digs it in short and angles it across the left hander, he shuffles but changes his mind and takes his eyes off the ball, the ball thuds on to his thigh pad
Lee to Ganguly, 1 run pitches outside off on a good length, he steers it wide of point

Lee to Dhoni, FOUR runs well what a way to get off the mark, Lee bangs it in short of a length and the ball skids through fairly quickly to Dhoni, he picks the length early and pulls with force past square leg
Siddle to Ganguly, 1 run pitches on a good length wide outside off and keeps a little low, Ganguly bends, stretches out and cuts square of the wicket and down to third man
Siddle to Dhoni, no run Siddle gets it to skid through really quickly and brings the ball back in after pitching, the ball clips Dhoni high on the pad
Siddle to Dhoni, no run good length on off and middle, he gets behind the line and defends
Siddle to Dhoni, no run hits a good length outside off, he gets his high backlift down and punches it firmly
Siddle to Dhoni, SIX runs that gets the crowd animated! Siddle bangs it in short, Dhoni picks the length early and thwacks it just over the fine leg rope, a very well executed hook
Siddle to Dhoni, no run pitches outside off and straightens, he lets it go

Lee to Ganguly, 2 runs short of a length and directed on the body, Ganguly shuffles and pulls it down to fine leg, White shows great commitment to slide and cut it off, Rudi Koertzen checks with the third umpire and White gets the benefit of the doubt
Lee to Ganguly, 1 leg bye another short ball and Ganguly shapes to pull again, the ball lobs off his body and Haddin flings himself to his right and gloves it down to fine leg, good attempt
Lee to Dhoni, no run Lee steams in from round the wicket, the ball is short and angled towards Dhoni
Lee to Dhoni, 1 run slides down leg and and he nudges it down to fine leg
Lee to Ganguly, no run left alone outside off
Lee to Ganguly, no run bangs it in short and Ganguly not for the first time takes his eyes off the ball, he evades it in the end, testing over by Lee
Siddle to Dhoni, no run fullish outside off, he mistimes the drive towards mid-off
Siddle to Dhoni, no run hits a good length outside off and it straightens before reaching Haddin

Siddle to Dhoni, FOUR runs very well timed, the ball shapes in off a good length, Dhoni commits to the front foot, opens the face of the bat and just executes a defensive push to beat cover and backward point, he uses the pace of the ball to steer it through
Siddle to Dhoni, no run holds the length back a little, this time he taps it back to the bowler
Siddle to Dhoni, no run brute of a delivery, comes back in off a good length, Dhoni is forced to play at it and is sliced in half, nearly an edge there
Siddle to Dhoni, no run simlar delivery, this time he gets a bigger stride across his stumps and pushes it away to the off side
Lee to Ganguly, 1 run banged in short from round the wicket, the ball stops a little on Ganguly so he checks his stroke and pulls along the turf past square leg
Lee to Dhoni, no run predictably digs it in short, he commits early to the pull but the ball comes on a little quicker, as a result he uneasily pulls it towards leg gully
Lee to Dhoni, 1 run shuffles across his stumps and tucks it wide of Lee, he gets off the blocks and calls quickly for the run
Lee to Ganguly, 1 run another short ball directed at Ganguly, takes his eyes off the ball but manages to fend it away safely past short square leg
Lee to Dhoni, no run pulls a short ball along the turf and Ponting does brilliantly to slide to to his right at square and intercept, saved a couple surely
Lee to Dhoni, no run ends the over with a bouncer, Dhoni decides against the hook and sways away
Siddle to Ganguly, no run fullish in length on middle and off, he shuffles and turns it to the on side
Siddle to Ganguly, no run punches it through the line to mid-on and thinks of a run, the ball travels fairly quickly to the fielder
Siddle to Ganguly, no run gets his bat nicely behind the line and times it well but he finds Hussey at point
Siddle to Ganguly, no run he bowls the slower one and gets it to curve in nicely through the air, he covers the movement and steers it towards cover
Siddle to Ganguly, no run quicker in pace and shorter in length, he gets his bat on an angles and carves it straight to point
Siddle to Ganguly, no run action replay, he carves it straight to Hussey at point yet again
Lee to Dhoni, FOUR runs Lee persists with his round the wicket line but the short delivery turns into a laf tracker, Dhoni manages to find enough time to rock back and pulls high over square leg
Lee to Dhoni, 1 run gets way across his stumps to another short delivery and he softly taps it away to fine lg
Lee to Ganguly, 1 run mixes it up with a full ball to catch Ganguly off guard, he stays at the crease and mistimes a drive behind square on the on sode
Lee to Dhoni, FOUR runs slightly short of a length but gives him enough room to free his arms, he flashes at it and safely carves it past point and cover
Lee to Dhoni, 1 run pushed towards mid-on for a quick single
Lee to Ganguly, no run bangs in a short delivery, he fends it off on his toes
Siddle to Dhoni, no run gets behind the line to a good length delivery and defends
Siddle to Dhoni, no run pitches on a good length and comes back in, he gets across and pushes it to the on side
Siddle to Dhoni, no run gets forward to a slightly fuller delivery and taps it back to Siddle
Siddle to Dhoni, no run pitches on a good length outside off, he steers it to the off side
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run opens the face of the bat in the last second and steers it to third man
Siddle to Ganguly, 1 run full and slightly wide outside off, he gets forward and drives wide of the covers
Johnson to Ganguly, no run back of a length outside off and straightens, he hops and steers it to the off side
Johnson to Ganguly, no run bangs it in shorter and he does well to get behind the line and defend
Johnson to Ganguly, no run slightly fuller in length, he shuffles just a touch but can't beat midwicket
Johnson to Ganguly, no run good length ball which cuts back in, Ganguly gets a thick inside edge onto his pads, that doesn't stop Johnson from appealing though
Johnson to Ganguly, 3 runs full and swinging away, he offers the full face of the bat and times it crisply past extra cover, good shot
Johnson to Dhoni, no run short delivery angled down the leg side, Dhoni strangely opts out of the stroke
Watson to Ganguly, no run comes round the wicket, he angles it in to the left hander, he gets forward and taps it away to point
Watson to Ganguly, no run cover the line to push a good length delivery down the ground but there isn't enough pace on the ball to work it through
Watson to Ganguly, 1 run this time the timing is a lot better as Ganguly pushes it past Watson who fails to get a hand to it
Watson to Dhoni, no run Dhoni commits to the back foot off a good length ball, he taps it back hard down the pitch

Watson to Dhoni, 2 runs I don't know if i'm right in calling that an agricultural heave, he picks a full delivery from wide outside off and drags it behind square on the on side, typical one-day shot in the slog over
Watson to Dhoni, FOUR runs shot! A little too full and wide outside the off stump and Dhoni reaches out and punches it crisply in the arc between mid-off and cover, plays it late
Johnson to Ganguly, 1 run steers it to sweeper cover for a single
Johnson to Dhoni, no run pitches outside off and gets a big angle across the right hander, the ball keeps low too
Johnson to Dhoni, no run this time he gets a big stride across his stumps and drives it to the right of cover
Johnson to Dhoni, no run wasted delivery, really full and wide outside off and left alone
Johnson to Dhoni, 2 runs not much pace on that ball, he improvises by getting across his stumps and whipping it to the deep on the on side for an easy two
Johnson to Dhoni, no run full outside off, he shoulders arms
Watson to Ganguly, 1 run fullish outside off and angling in, he pushes it wide of mid-off
Watson to Dhoni, no run slower in pace, lands on a fullish length and he gets forward and pushes it away to the off side
Watson to Dhoni, no run punches a fullish delivery hard but can't beat mid-off
Watson to Dhoni, no run hits a good length outside off and he chops it down towards point
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run angles in towards the batsman and he gets across and works it down towards fine leg
Watson to Ganguly, no run comes round the wicket to the left hander, he gets forward and pushes it to mid-on
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run short and angling wide of the off stump, he can't resist a slash but fortunately it's wide of second slip, third man picks it up
Johnson to Ganguly, no run gets across the stumps to a short of a length ball and tucks it straight to square leg
Johnson to Ganguly, no run shakes him up with a bouncer, well bowled by Johnson, Ganguly just manages to duck
Johnson to Ganguly, no run good length delivery and slower in pace, he gets forward and taps it to the covers, refuses the single
Johnson to Ganguly, no run opportunity for him to carve it through the off side but he mistimes it, the ball rolls to the off side
Johnson to Ganguly, 1 run fullish and angling away, he steers it past the off side and there's a sweeper cover for that shot
Watson to Ganguly, no run comes round the wicket and angles it in to the left hander, he gets forward and pushes it to cover
Watson to Ganguly, 1 run pitches on middle and leg, he punches it down towards mid-on
Watson to Dhoni, no run keeps a little low outside off and Dhoni has to bend a little low to slice it to point
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run a slow bouncer, Dhoni meets the ball close to the helmet and hooks along the ground to fine leg
Watson to Ganguly, 1 run hits a good length outside off, he gets across and cuts it down to the sweeper cover
Watson to Dhoni, no run gets a good drift in to the right hander to cramp him for room, he gets forward and firmly punches it towards mid-off
Johnson to Ganguly, no run bangs it in short of a length on middle stump and holds its line, ganguly's solid in defence on the back foot
Johnson to Ganguly, no run similar length and Ganguly has to hop to fend this off, safely played away
Johnson to Ganguly, no run slightly fuller in length and this holds its line as well, he taps it towards cover point
Johnson to Ganguly, no run slower ball and fuller in length, he softly pushes it back to the bowler
Johnson to Ganguly, no run bangs it in short outside off and Ganguly's isn't tempted to chase that, Johnson works up a bit of pace
Johnson to Ganguly, no run slightly short and wide outside off, he cuts straight to backward point
Watson to Dhoni, no run fullish and swinging in, he gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
Watson to Dhoni, no run fullish and swinging in, he works it down to cover
Watson to Dhoni, no run good change of pace, Dhoni commits to the drive but checks his push to mid-on
Watson to Dhoni, no run hits a good length and gets it to angle in to the right hander, he punches it firmly to mid-off
Watson to Dhoni, no run holds the length back a bit another firm punch finds the fielder, this time at cover
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run a bouncer this time, he swivels but doesn't quite time it as well as he would've liked, fine leg picks it up
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run pitches close to the pads, he works it to the on side for a single
Johnson to Ganguly, no run slides down the leg side and Ganguly misses an opportunity to glance it wide of Haddin
Johnson to Ganguly, no run pitches on a good length on middle and leg, he clips it to midwicket
Johnson to Ganguly, no run very good comeback by Johnson, he gets it to kick up off a good length and that squares up Ganguly outside the off stump, lucky not to get an edge
Johnson to Ganguly, no run full on the stumps and pushed to the on side
Johnson to Ganguly, no run bowls it much fuller and close to the yorker, he gets forward and digs it out to the off side
White to Dhoni, no run no turn, he chops it to the off side
White to Dhoni, no run not turn at all, Dhoni opts to let it go
White to Dhoni, no run slower through the air, Dhoni shoulders arms to another one which straightens
White to Dhoni, 1 run angles it towards middle and leg, he gets across his stumps for a premeditated sweep
White to Ganguly, no run quicker through the air, he gets forward and defends
White to Ganguly, 1 run gets forward and tucks it wide of square leg
Johnson to Ganguly, no run hits a good length outside off, he gets back and across and taps it to the off side
Johnson to Ganguly, 1 run delivers from wide of the crease, ganguly has a bit of width to free his arms, he times the cut well but there's protection in the deep to keep him quiet
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run pitches on middle and leg, he gets across his stumps and whips it wide of mid-on

Johnson to Ganguly, FOUR runs comes round the wicket but the change of attack doesn't help, he overpitches on the pads, he shuffles early and clips it wide of midwicket, that should ease a lot of pressure
Johnson to Ganguly, no run contiues with the same line of attack but he pitches it much shorter, Ganguly tries to glance but misses
Johnson to Ganguly, no run gets across and pushes it to mid-on
White to Dhoni, no run sticks his pad out to let it go, not turn again
White to Dhoni, 1 run he sweeps very close to the pad and that prompts an appeal from White, more of a half hearted appeal
White to Ganguly, no run fails to connect a sweep and haddin gathers it and whips off the leg stump
White to Ganguly, 1 run flighted on middle and leg, he works it to the on side
White to Dhoni, 1 run floated on middle and leg, he nudges it to fine leg
White to Ganguly, FOUR runs very well executed, White gives it a lot of air and overpitches on the pads, he gets a stride forwar and neatly pushes it through the line past midwicket and mid-on
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run continues round the wicket, he tucks it with the angle to the deep on the on side and that brings up the 400
Johnson to Ganguly, no run hits a good length outside off, he gets across and taps it to the off side
Johnson to Ganguly, no run fuller in length, gets a half stride forward and softly taps it towards mid-on
Johnson to Ganguly, no run Ganguly gets forward and steers it towards point and shows a lot urgency in getting off the strike, his captains yells and sends him back
Johnson to Ganguly, no run hits a good length outside off, he pushes it to the covers
Johnson to Ganguly, 1 run hits a good length outside off, he pushes it wide of the cover to keep the strike after lunch
White to Ganguly, no run pushed towards midwicket
White to Ganguly, no run flighted on middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
White to Ganguly, 1 run pitches on a good length outside off, he pats it wide of point
White to Dhoni, no run pushed in faster, he lunges forward to defend
White to Dhoni, no run gives it more air, he drives firmly to short extra cover

White to Dhoni, SIX runs he goes downtown! Dhoni sees the extra flight and waltzes down the track, he carts White high over his head and that goes a few rows back, it's his fifty as well, very welcome knock by the Indian captain
Watson to Ganguly, no run pitches outside off from round the wicket, he gets forward and taps it to the covers
Watson to Ganguly, no run gets a little width outside off but he flashes without moving his feet, he knows he didn't make good use of that
Watson to Ganguly, no run full and close to middle and off, he gets forward and pushes to extra cover
Watson to Ganguly, no run too wide outside the off stump, Ganguly doesn't really commit himself to the punch and settles for a dot ball to the covers
Watson to Ganguly, 1 run slower ball, he taps it to Ponting at point and risks a single, he makes it on time and the throw is a trifle wide of the stumps

Watson to Dhoni, FOUR runs too wide outside the off stump, the lack of pace allows Dhoni to wait on it, get his feet across and slash wide of backward point and cover, full marks for placement and timing too
White to Ganguly, 1 run slow through the air, he nudges it down to square leg
White to Dhoni, no run goes for an expansive drive but doesn't pick the googly, gets a thick inside edge on to the toe of his pads
White to Dhoni, no run slower through the air and straightens, he gets a half stride forward and defends
White to Dhoni, no run another googly, lunges forward and the ball hits him on the pads maybe just outside the line of leg, White and the rest appeal, Rauf shakes his head
White to Dhoni, 1 run stays back and punches a straight ball down to long-on
White to Ganguly, 1 leg bye gives it more air but drifts down the leg side, the ball deflects off Haddin and they pick up a legbye
Watson to Ganguly, 1 run short and wide outside the off stump and he slashes, beats point but Katich's there in the deep to mop up
Watson to Dhoni, 4 leg byes short of a length and drifting down the leg side, he pulls, makes contact with the thigh pad and the ball rolls to fine leg
Watson to Dhoni, no run comes in just a little with the angle and he punches it hard down the pitch
Watson to Dhoni, no run fuller in length and he plays it firmly back to the bowler
Watson to Dhoni, no run skids through a little quicker and comes in after pitching, Dhoni's cramped for room on the cut and he places it to short cover
Watson to Dhoni, no run gets forward to a fullish delivery and attempts a quick single to mid-off, changes his mind
White to Ganguly, no run makes room to cut a length delivery, places it to point
White to Ganguly, 1 run flighted on the pads, he works it with the turn to square leg
White to Dhoni, 1 run way too flat, the ball lands as a half tracker and Dhoni mistimes the paddle-pull (if such a shot exists), he's frustrated he couldn't slam it for four
White to Ganguly, no run flighted down the leg side, he fails to make contact with the sweep
White to Ganguly, no run floated close to the pads, pushed to the on side
White to Ganguly, no run flighted on the pads again and he pushes this back to the bowler, nervous 90s, understandable
Watson to Dhoni, no run fires in the yorker, well bowled, Dhoni does well to dig it out
Watson to Dhoni, 2 leg byes slides towards the pads and he nudges it away towards fine leg off his pads
Watson to Dhoni, no run full and curving in, he digs it out to long-off
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run pitches on a good length outside off, he pushes it past the covers to bring up the 100 stand off 160 balls
Watson to Ganguly, no run good bouncer by watson, the loopy type, Ganguly watches it closely, bends down and lets it go
Watson to Ganguly, no run pitches that outside off and gets it to curve in, he watchfully lets it go
White to Dhoni, 1 run short and wide outside off, no turn, he cuts to sweeper cover

White to Ganguly, FOUR runs Hundred No. 16 and what a time to get it! White flights it on the pads and he works it away past square leg, there's nobody patrolling the deep and that was four from the moment it left the bat, he punches the air, flashes a million dollar smile and Ponting applauds too
White to Ganguly, 1 run flighted on the pads, he gets on his knee and sweeps
White to Dhoni, no run stays back, keeps a little low, he chops it back to the bowler
White to Dhoni, 1 run flighted outside off, he punches it in front of mid-off and sets off, Ganguly scampers home
White to Ganguly, no run slightly wide outside off, he makes room but can't find the gap on the on side
Watson to Dhoni, no run pitches on middle and leg and skids through, the ball deflects off his pads to the off side
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run quicker delivery, gets it to curve back in and he pushes it to the sweeper cover
Watson to Ganguly, no run 85.6 mph, comes round the wicket, he turns the face of the bat and nudges it to midwicket
Watson to Ganguly, no run good delivery, gets it to come back in sharply with the angle and Ganguly is equal to the task as he gets his bat nicely behind the line and defends
Watson to Ganguly, 1 run angles towards middle and leg, he pushes it softly to the right of mid-off and sets off, Dhoni makes it in time
Watson to Dhoni, no run pitches outside off and holds its line after pitching, Dhoni shoulders arms, remember Haddin is standing up to the stumps

White to Ganguly, OUT Rush of blood and he's out caught in the deep, White delivers that a little wide of off stump, Ganguly makes a bit of room, gives the charge and goes ahead with the loft, it was clear from the start that he wasn't in full control of the shot, Lee takes the catch falling backwards at long-off
White to Dhoni, no run flighted on middle and leg, he pushes it back to the bowler
White to Dhoni, no run flighted outside off, he pushes it to the off side
White to Dhoni, no run the googly, hits him somewhere close to the back leg on the forward defense and White appeals, that was missing everything
White to Dhoni, no run flighted on middle and leg, he pushes it to midwicket
White to Dhoni, 1 run floated down the leg side, he nudges it behind square on the on side
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run gets it to curve in nicely through the air, he gets forward and firmly pushes it to deep mid-off and sets off
Watson to Harbhajan, no run gets nicely behind the line and defends a full delivery off the full face of the bat
Watson to Harbhajan, no run pitches outside off and holds its line before reaching the keeper, Harbhajan gets way across his stumps and shoulders arms
Watson to Harbhajan, no run curves in through the air and he tucks firmly to midwicket
Watson to Harbhajan, no run too wide outside the off stump for Harbhajan to chase that, he lets it go
Watson to Harbhajan, no run hits a good length outside off, he shoulders arms again, Watson is waiting for that mistake
White to Dhoni, no run flighted outside off, he lunges forward and pushes it back to the bowler
White to Dhoni, no run pitches outside off and holds its line, he shoulders arms
White to Dhoni, 2 runs gives him the charge and tries to cart him over extra cover but mistimes it, it lands in the middle of nowhere
White to Dhoni, 2 runs softly taps it to the vacant square leg region and sets off quickly, the second run puts pressure on Harbhajan but he makes it before the direct hit
White to Dhoni, no run flighted outside off and pushed to the off side
White to Dhoni, no run pushed just wide of mid-off and there was a single for the taking, Harbhajan sends his partner back
Watson to Harbhajan, no run fullish outside off, pushed towards mid-off
Watson to Harbhajan, no run full again and he shapes to drive but he mistimes the stroke, can't get off the mark
Watson to Harbhajan, 1 run and he's off the blocks, plays an elegant cover drive to a full delivery and places it to deep cover
Watson to Dhoni, no run tries to slice it past backward point but he places it straight to the fielder
Watson to Dhoni, no run pitches outside off and comes back in, tries to work it to the on side but edges on to his pads
Watson to Dhoni, no run full and swinging away, he drives on the walk but can't beat mid-off

White to Harbhajan, OUT White strikes again! The one that goes through straight, he's almost made it his stock delivery, Harbhajan leaves a big gap between bat and pad as he tries to drive through the off side, the ball knocks back the off stump, lazy shot by Harbhajan
White to Khan, 1 run moves across and softly tucks it behind the wicketkeeper
White to Dhoni, no run pitches outside off and straightens before reaching Haddin
White to Dhoni, 1 run full and wide outside off, he drives towards long-off
White to Khan, no run lunges forward and the ball lobs off the pads to forward short leg
White to Khan, no run flighted outside off he defends
Siddle to Dhoni, FOUR runs he pitches it too short and wide outside off, there's protection in the deep but Dhoni punches it wide of them and the ball races away to the deep cover boundary
Siddle to Dhoni, no run gets forward and defends
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run steps down the pitch to Siddle and works him away past cover
Siddle to Khan, 1 run slightly wide outside off, he reaches out and takes a single to the off side to bring up the 450
Siddle to Dhoni, SIX runs take that! Dhoni steps down the track to Siddle and carts him high over long-off, the ball was picked off a good length, it's clear he wants to get to his hundred fast
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run shuffles across his stumps and places it to the deep on the on side
White to Dhoni, no run gently flighted outside off stump and he watches it go by
White to Dhoni, 1 run comes out but mistimes the shot along the ground to mid-on
White to Khan, no run flights it on a length and he nudges to the off side
White to Khan, no run well flighted, hint of drift, defended back to White
White to Khan, no run comes forward and defends this one to the man at point
White to Khan, no run short and spins in and he cuts off the back foot to point
Siddle to Dhoni, no run on a length and he runs this to backward point with ease
Siddle to Dhoni, no run slower ball, fuller in length, caressed to the man at cover
Siddle to Dhoni, no run tidy stuff and he eases forward to press it back to Siddle
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run comes onto the front foot and pushes this into the covers
Siddle to Khan, no run beaten off a length by one that straightens, Zaheer feels for it
Siddle to Khan, no run short of a length outside off and he leaves this one be
White to Dhoni, no run quicker through the air, he stays on the back foot and keeps it away
White to Dhoni, SIX runs waltzes down the track, makes use of the flight and slams him against the turn over long-off, there were at least three fielders on the deep and he beat all of them

White to Dhoni, FOUR runs heads up! White pushes this a little flatter but that doesn't stop Dhoni from giving the charge, he smashes it flat and the ball fizzes past White and poor Asad Rauf, was that a bird or a plane?
White to Dhoni, no run quite a big spinning googly, he defends it away
White to Dhoni, no run bowls seam up, pushes that flatter and faster, he pushes it back to the bowler

White to Dhoni, OUT quite unnecessary there, White bowls seam up, Dhoni punches a skiddy delivery to Lee at mid-off and risks the single, Zaheer was always struggling and couldn't beat the throw despite the dive, Haddin whips the bails and Koertzen doesn't call for the third umpire, it was that obvious
Siddle to Dhoni, no run pushes it to the off side and farms the strike
Siddle to Dhoni, no run fires in an inswinging yorker on middle and leg and he digs it out to the deep, he refuses the single
Siddle to Dhoni, no run delivers from wide of the crease, he gets forward and taps it to the deep on the off side, no single again
Siddle to Dhoni, no run pushes it towards long-off, no run again
Siddle to Dhoni, no run gets behind the line and quietly defends it away, now he has to take a single off the last ball

Siddle to Dhoni, OUT was he a little unlucky there? A big inswinger by Siddle, Dhoni moves across his stumps and attempts to work it to the on side for a single, it appears as if he got an inside edge onto his pads, Siddle is confident and Koertzen raises the finger, that may have missed the legstump as well, I need to see another replay of that

Nevertheless, Dhoni's knock was welcome and this will prop his Test average. He looked to attack and played his natural game. Siddle has done well for himself on debut picking up 3 for 114. All he needs is more helpful conditions. Do join us shortly for the Australian reply.

So India finish with 469. We said earlier that if Dhoni comes good India will get somewhere close to 500. They should be happy with this but may be a trifle disappointed at how the innings ended. At least two out of the last four wickets were giveaways.
Haddin's the new man in
Khan to Watson, no run Too wide to tempt Watson into playing a shot, he lets it go to the keeper
Khan to Watson, no run This ball is closer to off, Watson drives firmly to cover, can't find the gap though
Khan to Watson, no run a touch short on off, Watson gets on the front foot and plays it to backward point
Khan to Watson, 1 run bouncer but misdirected and not very quick either, that was down the leg side and Watson goes the pull, doesn't quite time it as it runs away towards fine leg
Khan to Hussey, no run draws Hussey onto the front foot and he defends it to cover
Khan to Hussey, 1 run shorter this time, and slightly outside off, Hussey steers it towards point where a lazy Sehwag misfields to give away a single
Sharma to Hussey, no run good length from Ishant, Hussey punches it confidently to point
Sharma to Hussey, 2 runs just outside off, Hussey opens the face and works it away towards point again, excellent running gets the batsmen two runs
Sharma to Hussey, 2 runs That's Hussey's fifty, banged in short by Ishant, Hussey pulls it, god placement but it was stopped by Zaheer at the boundary
Sharma to Hussey, FOUR runs Nearly out! Ishant gets the outside edge from a ball that angle across Hussey, drops short of Dravid at first slip
Sharma to Haddin, no run length ball on off, kept a touch low, Haddin defends it towards cover
Khan to Watson, no run attempted yorker results in a waist high full toss, Watson defends it comfortably, Zaheer apologises immediately
Khan to Watson, no run back of a length delivery, punched firmly by Watson towards mid-off
Khan to Watson, no run This ball goes across Watson who shoulders arms to it
Khan to Watson, no run Watson doesn't have to play at that one either as it well wide of off stump
Khan to Watson, no run better line this time, on off and Watson defends it solidly on the front foot
Khan to Watson, no run length ball on middle, Watson punches it back to the bowler
Sharma to Haddin, no run back of a length, stayed low on Haddin, just about managed to defend that one
Sharma to Haddin, no run Haddin jumps and defends another length ball on off stump
Sharma to Haddin, no run Good line and length again from Ishant, Haddin punches it to mid-on
Sharma to Haddin, 2 leg byes full delivery, strays onto leg stump, raps his pads and trickles away behind square
Sharma to Haddin, no run back of a length, in the channel outside off, Haddin tries to force it down the ground but doesn't time it very well
Sharma to Haddin, no run some movement into Haddin, stayed a bit low again, Haddin defends
Khan to Watson, no run Zaheer tries the bouncer, Watson's ducks under it
Khan to Watson, 1 run bangs it in short again, Watson pulls firmly and square leg umpire Rudi Koertzen can't get out of the way in time. He's doesn't seem hurt though and even manages a chuckle
Khan to Haddin, no run defended solidly by Haddin
Khan to Haddin, FOUR runs that was close, Haddin gets an inside edge and it races away just inches past his leg stump
Khan to Haddin, no run driven firmly to mid-off but doesn't beat the fielder
Khan to Haddin, 1 run played with soft hands towards point, Haddin sets off straightaway for the single
Sharma to Haddin, no run Ishant keeps nagging away just outside the off stump, Haddin defends it back to the bowler
Sharma to Haddin, no run similar delivery, just a hint of away movement, Haddin gets on the front foot and plays it to cover
Sharma to Haddin, no run Ishant maintains a tight line, Haddin gets behind the line of the delivery and defends
Sharma to Haddin, no run Ishant brings out the slower delivery, ends up as a full toss, Haddin was a touch surprised by it and can't capitalise on that one
Sharma to Haddin, 1 run Ishant reverts to a good length on off, Haddin inside-edges it to square leg for a single
Sharma to Watson, no run full delivery outside off, Watson shoulders arms
Khan to Haddin, no run good line and length, defended to mid-off
Khan to Haddin, no run slightly wider this time, Haddin wanted to power it down the ground, timing was awry and it trickles to mid-off
Khan to Haddin, no run length delivery on off stump, defended solidly by Haddin
Khan to Haddin, no run A rare loose ball, short and wide, Haddin chases it and slaps it hard but can't beat the cover point fielder
Khan to Haddin, 1 run short ball and Haddin pulls it, Ishant does the fielding at backward square leg
Khan to Watson, no run Good leave from Watson, back of a length ball, angling across him, that wasn't too far from off stump
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run starts off with a length delivery on off, Haddin defends towards the leg side
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run shorter, bit more flight, gets some turn, Haddin plays it to short leg
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run similar ball, Haddin defends again to the leg side
Harbhajan to Haddin, 1 run flighted delivery on the off, turning in, Haddin pushes it to leg
Harbhajan to Watson, no run Waston gets on the back foot and tries to turn it past the short leg but doesn't beat the man there
Harbhajan to Watson, no run Big stride in from Watson as he confidently defends
Khan to Haddin, 1 run full ball, down the leg side, Haddin manages to work it to the right of mid-on, quick single is taken
Khan to Watson, FOUR runs opened him up with a short of length ball angling across him, gets the outside edge, but doesn't carry to Dhoni and races away behind him and first slip for a boundary
Khan to Watson, no run Wide outside off and Watson decides to leave that delivery alone
Khan to Watson, no run Watson shoulders arms again as Zaheer sends it too far outside the off stump to trouble the batsman
Khan to Watson, no run back of a length, on middle and off this time, Watson defends it back to the bowler
Khan to Watson, no run Another I'm-not-interested-in-that leave from Watson as Zaheer fires it wide outside off
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run tossed up, on a length outside off, inside edged towards midwicket
Harbhajan to Haddin, no run Haddin uses his feet to try unsettle the bowler, but the length was too short and he plays it back to the bowler
Harbhajan to White, no run White gets on the front foot defends his first ball
Harbhajan to White, no run A repeat of the previous ball, Harbhajan is flighting his deliveries now and getting it to land on a great length just outside off
Harbhajan to White, no run plays it to silly point
Khan to Watson, FOUR runs length ball, not too far outside off, Watson gets on the front foot and square drives it for a boundary. Lot of runs behind point today
Khan to Watson, no run on middle and leg, pushed firmly to midwicket
Khan to Watson, no run outside off, and Watson lets that go through to the keeper
Khan to Watson, no run overpitched delivery, Waston was provided the width and he went after it but the timing was poor and it goes to the fielder at cover
Khan to Watson, FOUR runs Back of a length, bit of width, Watson opens the face of the bat and guides the ball between the slips for another boundary in the third-man region
Khan to Watson, no run length ball, inside edge on to the pads, stifled appeal from the bowler
Harbhajan to White, no run more flight from Harbhajan, White defends off the front foot
Harbhajan to White, no run similar delivery and the man at short leg is having to do some work as the batsmen keep defending
Harbhajan to White, no run defence, to the slip this time
Harbhajan to White, no run fuller ball, on off and middle, White tries to work it away toward square leg, but doesn't quite get hold of it
Harbhajan to White, no run patted to the leg side this time
Harbhajan to White, no run Watson punches it to cover, can't the pierce the field
Mishra to Watson, no run oooh, a legspinner's dream delivery, tossed up, on a length, drawa Watson on the front foot and the big turn beats his front foot defence
Mishra to Watson, no run outside off, Watson lets that go
Mishra to Watson, no run driven to cover this time, no run though
Mishra to Watson, 1 run glanced to backward square leg
Mishra to White, no run full delivery, getting good dip, White works it away to backward point
Mishra to White, 1 run gets the outside edge as White looks to defend on the front foot, ball runs away to short third man
Harbhajan to White, no run White smothers the ball with his front-foot defence
Harbhajan to White, no run tapped to the short leg fielder this time
Harbhajan to White, no run Batsmen are being kept quiet here. Watson pushes it to the leg side. You can feel the pressure building
Harbhajan to White, no run this time he pats it to silly point
Harbhajan to White, no run blocked back to the bowler
Harbhajan to White, no run Leg-stump line but White doesn't go for a big shot. He pushes it towards mid-on
Mishra to Watson, FOUR runs Mishra strays on to the pads and Watson manges to get a bit of bat on it and it runs away fine for a boundary
Mishra to Watson, no run gets it on middle this time, defended off the back foot
Mishra to Watson, no run
Mishra to Watson, 2 runs punched past midwicket, Tendulkar does the retrieving
Mishra to Watson, no run played back to the bowler
Mishra to Watson, no run driven to short cover, can't find the gap
Harbhajan to White, no run on middle and leg, White defends it back to the bowler
Harbhajan to White, 1 run more flight this time, White drives and it was a bit uppish but wide to the bowler's right
Harbhajan to Watson, no run played towards the cover
Harbhajan to Watson, 1 run bog turn from a length outside off, Watson gets on the back foot and turns it square on the leg side
Harbhajan to White, no run More flighted stuff from Harbhajan, and more front-foot defence from White
Harbhajan to White, 1 run on middle and leg, White nurdles it past midwicket for a single to retain the strike

Mishra to White, 2 runs on a length, pitched just outside off, White plays it with soft hands to cover, batsmen go for a quick single, Sehwag attempts to throw stumps down at the batsman's end but misses and concedes an overthrow
Mishra to Lee, no run Lenght delivery pitching outside off, Lee tries to block off the front foot, gets an outside edge and it runs away towards point
Mishra to Lee, no run far more solid defence from Lee this time
Mishra to Lee, no run topspinner from Mishra and Lee wasn't too comfortable dealing with the extra bounce, he inside-edges it on to his pads
Mishra to Lee, no run pitched outside leg, Lee attempts to sweep, misses completely and is hit in front of the stump, Mishra appeals but that's not out
Harbhajan to Watson, 1 run tossed up, punched to cover for a quick single
Harbhajan to Lee, no run another appeal for lbw, tossed up and raps his pads in front of middle and leg, but that would have gone done leg
Harbhajan to Lee, no run comes down the track this time and looks for the big drive, timing isn't great and the ball goes back to the bowler
Harbhajan to Lee, 1 run Another looping delivery, swept to backward square leg
Harbhajan to Watson, no run Watson gets behind the line of that and defends
Harbhajan to Watson, no run tries to work it to third man
Mishra to Lee, no run Lee comes down the pitch and punches it to cover
Mishra to Lee, FOUR runs poor delivery, short ball down the leg side, Lee helps it away fine behind square and it beats Ganguly to the boundary
Mishra to Lee, no run much better ball, good loop, pitching on middle and leg and spinning away, defended by the batsman
Mishra to Lee, no run Lee's attempted front foot defence is beaten comprehensively by a big turner
Mishra to Lee, no run Lee pushes it towards cover, no chance of a single as it goes straight to the fielder
Mishra to Lee, (no ball) no-ball, a length ball on off, worked away towards point
Mishra to Lee, no run good length, just outside off, prodded towards point
Harbhajan to Watson, no run doosra from Harbhajan, Watson was opened up by that one as he tried to defend off the back foot
Harbhajan to Watson, no run much more convincing from Watson as he taps it to silly point
Harbhajan to Watson, no run tossed up, just outside off, extra bounce and Watson is hit on the glove but down to the ground, great delivery from Harbhajan
Harbhajan to Watson, no run defended confidently by Watson
Harbhajan to Watson, no run punched to mid-on, Watson thought of going for a single but decided against it
Harbhajan to Watson, no run Flatter, pitching on off, Watson works it to the leg side
Mishra to Lee, no run flighted delivery on the stumps, Lee drives it to cover
Mishra to Lee, no run Mishra tosses it up and is overpitched outside off, Lee smashes it straight to point
Mishra to Lee, no run on off, Lee pushes it down the ground
Mishra to Lee, no run flighted again, Lee defends solidly
Mishra to Lee, no run more solid defence from Lee
Mishra to Lee, no run driven straight to the fielder at mid-off
Harbhajan to Watson, no run Harbhajan starts well, with a delivery that draws Watson onto the front foot as he defends
Harbhajan to Watson, no run flighted again, huge turn from outside off, Watson shoulders arms
Harbhajan to Watson, 1 run Watson pushes it firmly to mid-on
Harbhajan to Lee, no run on a length, on middle and leg, Lee uses his feet and punches it to mid-on
Harbhajan to Lee, no run big stride in as Lee defends it to the off side
Harbhajan to Lee, no run a touch shorter, drifting on to the pads, Lee turns it to square leg
Mishra to Watson, 1 run overpitched, just outside off, driven to covers
Mishra to Lee, 2 runs on off again, and Lee punches it down the ground with superb timing, straight past the bowler, Zaheer just about manages to pull it back in
Mishra to Lee, no run overpitched, on middle and leg this time, Lee gets his front foot out of the way and defends
Mishra to Lee, no run patted back to the bowler
Mishra to Lee, no run Stifled appeal from the bowler but that was going down leg after pitching on leg and middle
Mishra to Lee, no run defended solidly back to the bowler
Harbhajan to Watson, no run flighted delivery, Waston gets behind the line and defends
Harbhajan to Watson, no run full ball, just outside off, tapped towards the leg side
Harbhajan to Watson, no run Watson's hardly getting the ball off the square, mostly solid defence as in this delivery
Harbhajan to Watson, no run back-foot defence from Watson this time
Harbhajan to Watson, no run gets a big stride in as he blocks the ball
Harbhajan to Watson, 2 runs turned to deep square leg for a couple
Mishra to Lee, 1 run Lee didn't have much of an idea where that went, tossed up and pitched on leg, Lee tried to work it to midwicket but gets the edge and it flies towards point
Mishra to Watson, 1 run shorter ball, going straight after pitching on middle and leg, Lee punches it towards mid-on
Mishra to Lee, FOUR runs drops short again, provides width this time, Lee rocks onto the backfoot and crashes through in front of point for four
Mishra to Lee, no run Mishra responds with a googly, pitching well outside off, defended well by Lee
Mishra to Lee, no run that kept a touch low as Lee gets right back to defend
Mishra to Lee, no run gets on the front foot and blocks it
Harbhajan to Watson, no run pitching on a length, outside off, Watson exhibits his front-foot defence again
Harbhajan to Watson, no run a bit of extra bounce, Watson gets on the back foot to defend this time
Harbhajan to Watson, no run patted back to the bowler
Harbhajan to Watson, no run gets inside the line of the ball and taps it to short leg
Harbhajan to Watson, no run More solid defence from Watson, getting behind the line
Harbhajan to Watson, no run played back to the bowler, a maiden from Harbhajan
Mishra to Lee, no run tossed up, on a length outside off, Lee comes down the track and drives firmly to mid-off
Mishra to Lee, no run front foot defence this time from Lee
Mishra to Lee, no run pitching on middle and leg, Lee plays it cautiously back to the bowler
Mishra to Lee, no run length delivery, pitching on leg, Leestays on the back foot and defends awkwardly
Mishra to Lee, no run defended back to the bowler again
Mishra to Lee, no run Lee uses his feet and drives but can't get the ball past Mishra
Harbhajan to Watson, no run length ball, just outside off, Watson blocks it off the front foot
Harbhajan to Watson, 4 leg byes sliding down the line this time, raps Watson's pads and run away fine down the leg side for a boundary
Harbhajan to Watson, no run length ball but Watson stays on the back foot and defends
Harbhajan to Watson, 1 run again on his legs, Watson nudges it around for a single behind square
Harbhajan to Lee, no run better line this time, on off, Lee prods it towards cover
Harbhajan to Lee, no run defended by Lee off the front foot, gets an inside edge and rolls towards short mid-on
Mishra to Watson, no run defended off the front foot by Watson
Mishra to Watson, no run length ball outside off, Watson guides it towards point, though of a single but decided against it
Mishra to Watson, no run defended down to the fielder at short third man
Mishra to Watson, no run Watson gets right back and shows the full face of the bat to defend a length delivery on middle
Mishra to Watson, no run more solid defence from Watson
Mishra to Watson, no run a bit of extra bounce for Mishra, Watson gets an edge when trying to block the ball, there was no silly point to collect that
Harbhajan to Lee, no run defended confidently to the off side
Harbhajan to Lee, no run Harbhajan keeps Lee quiet with another ball on a length pitching just outside off
Harbhajan to Lee, no run Lee gets into a bit of a tangle as he tries to defend that one, inside edge that goes towards short mid-on
Harbhajan to Lee, no run
Harbhajan to Lee, no run Lee gets a big stride it and taps it silly point
Harbhajan to Lee, no run and again, Lee blocks it confidently
Mishra to Watson, 1 run tossed up, slightly overpitched, Watson comes down the track and works it into the gap through cover
Mishra to Lee, no run shorter this time, and a bit of width, Lee trie to crack that through covers but couldn't quite get hold of it
Mishra to Lee, no run flatter delivery, not much turn after pitching just outside off, Lee handles that comfortably, blocking off the front foot
Mishra to Lee, FOUR runs flighted this time, Lee comes down the track, gets to the pitch and creams it down the ground for a superb boundary
Mishra to Lee, no run defended off the front foot
Mishra to Lee, FOUR runs length ball outside off, Lee comes down the track again,and lofts it over mid-off, second boundary in three balls

Sharma to Watson, no run Watson is hit on the pads off Ishant's first ball, huge appeal from the bowler, pitched just outside off, hit low on the pads within the stumps, umpire might have thought there was an inside edge
Sharma to Watson, no run full, outside off, driven back to the bowler
Sharma to Watson, no run length delivery, slightly outside off, defended towards cover
Sharma to Watson, no run similar delivery from Ishant, Watson works it away towards point
Sharma to Watson, 2 runs back of a length, on middle and leg, turned towards square leg, superb running fetches the batsmen two, and Watson is now level with his highest Test score
Sharma to Watson, 1 leg bye Rapped on the pads again, that was sliding down the leg side
Mishra to Watson, SIX runs a long hop from Mishra, Watson gets his front foot out of the way and clobbers that over midwicket
Mishra to Watson, no run Watson reverts to watchful front-foot defence
Mishra to Watson, 1 run pushed down the ground, Waston wants a single and gets it
Mishra to Lee, no run googly from Mishra, Lee blocks it off the front foot
Mishra to Lee, no run Lee's gaining confidence here, using his feet and cracks it straight back, Mishra manages to stop it
Mishra to Lee, no run some turn for Mishra, pitched on middle, Lee gets a thick outside edge and the ball trickles towards backward point
Sharma to Watson, FOUR runs back of a length and outside off, Watson dispatches that in front of square to bring up his first Test fifty
Sharma to Watson, no run slower ball from Ishant, 103.1 kmph, but wasn't quite on target, well outside off and Watson leaves that alone
Sharma to Watson, 1 run back of a length, in the corridor outside off, Watson opens the face of teh bat to guide it to third man where Sachin Tendulkar has some ground to cover before cutting it off
Sharma to Lee, no run punched firmly to cover point by Lee
Sharma to Lee, no run short ball, very wide, Lee goes for the cut but doesn't make contact
Sharma to Lee, no run on off stump, shortish ball, Watson plays it to the right of cover point, thinks of a single but decides against it
Khan to Watson, 1 run Starts off with a delivery down leg side, Watson turns it away square and Ishant Sharma does the fielding
Khan to Lee, no run on off stump this time, Lee an inside edge and the ball rolls away behind sqaure on the leg side
Khan to Lee, FOUR runs What a shot to bring up the fifty partnership. Lee hardly put any effort behind that straight drive, great timing sees it race to the boundary.
Khan to Lee, no run Superb comeback from Zaheer, yorker on leg stump, Lee manages to dig it out towards square leg
Khan to Lee, no run back of a length ball, Lee plays it back to the bowler, Zaheer doesn't manage to pick it up put motions as if he is going to throw down the stumps. Lee has a chuckle about it
Khan to Lee, 1 run driven firmly to mid-on, the batsmen decide to go for the single, Tendulkar's shies at the stumps but the batsmen weren't in danger of being running out
Sharma to Lee, no run Ishant bangs it in short, Lee takes his eyes off teh ball and is struck on the back, Ishant glares at him, Lee is unfazed by it
Sharma to Lee, no run fuller length delivery on the off, Lee pushes it to cover
Sharma to Lee, no run another bouncer from Ishant, Lee tries to force it to the off but the ball trickles to the bowler, more glares from Ishant
Sharma to Lee, no run short of a length, just outside off, Lee gets well out of the way of that one
Sharma to Lee, no run again outside off and Lee isn't interested in that one, he lets it through to the keeper
Sharma to Lee, 2 runs gets on the back foot nad punches it to sweeper cover for a couple
Khan to Watson, no run length ball on off, Watson offers the full face of the bat as he defends it towards mid-off
Khan to Watson, no run wider this time, Watson tries to force it past mid-off but the timing was awry
Khan to Watson, no run better timing this time from Watson but straight to the fielder at mid-off
Khan to Watson, no run another good looking drive from Watson, placement wasn't very good again, straight to the fielder at extra cover
Khan to Watson, 1 run much closer to the body, played with soft hands towards point, single taken
Khan to Lee, no run back of a length on middle and leg, Lee mistimes it back to the bowler
Sharma to Watson, 1 run again probing away around the off stump, driven back to Ishant, who can't collect it cleanly and it rolls away towards mid-on
Sharma to Lee, no run similar delivery from Ishant, Lee punches it hard towards cover off the front foot
Sharma to Lee, no run shorter this time, on off stump, Lee gets a thick inside edge and the ball trickles away in front of square on the leg side
Sharma to Lee, no run Ishant brings out the slower delivery, misdirected, well outside off, Lee goes for the drive but doesn't connect
Sharma to Lee, no run dug in short by Ishant, Lee ducks under that comfortably
Sharma to Lee, no run slower ball again, 106 kmph, better direction this time, Lee picked it up though and he plays it back to the bowler
Khan to Watson, 1 run length ball on off, Watson plays it with soft hands towards point, easy single
Khan to Lee, no run short ball, wide outside off, Lee gets an under-edge and it bounces before going to Dhoni
Khan to Lee, no run fuller ball on middle and leg this time, Lee blocks it back to the bowler
Khan to Lee, no run similar delivery, Lee lifts his back foot as he flicks it towards mid-on
Khan to Lee, no run on middle stump, good length, Lee defends confidently off the front foot
Khan to Lee, no run bouncer on leg stump, didn't get up as high as Lee expected and he is forced to duck awkwardly, nearly loses his balance there
Sharma to Watson, 1 run back of a length, Watson plays it to backward point for a single
Sharma to Lee, FOUR runs great shot from Lee, overpitched on middle and leg and Lee drives it back down the ground and holds the follow through for the photographers
Sharma to Lee, no run punched to mid-off, straight to the fielder
Sharma to Lee, no run back of a length, angling in after pitching on middle and off, Lee blocks it towards mid-on
Sharma to Lee, no run short of length, outside off, swing and a miss from Lee
Sharma to Lee, no run very short, just outside off, 120kmph, Lee wanted to smash that one through the off but gets a bottom edge and the ball rolls back to the bowler
Khan to Watson, no run good length on middle and off, Watson defends to the side
Khan to Watson, no run well outside off, Watson shoulders arms
Khan to Watson, no run Watson gets behind the line of the ball and defends stoutly
Khan to Watson, 1 run Watson looks to work that one towards point, gets an inside edge and the ball trickles towards square leg
Khan to Lee, no run yorker length delivery, Lee manages to dig that one out
Khan to Lee, 1 run Lee gets on the front foot and pushes it to cover for a single
Sharma to Lee, no run Ishant keeps it short of a length, on off, Watson taps it towards off
Sharma to Lee, 1 run on middle and leg this time, Lee nudges it away towards midwicket for a single
Sharma to Watson, FOUR runs Whack! short ball outside off, Watson smashes it to the midwicket boundary.
Sharma to Watson, no run better t\length from Ishant, Watson gets on the back foot and pushes it to cover
Sharma to Watson, no run outside off, good length, Watson watches that through to the keeper
Sharma to Watson, no run a touch closer to off but not close enough to tempt Watson into playing that
Harbhajan to Lee, 2 runs tossed up, overpitched, Lee comes down a couple of paces and pushes it past mid-off
Harbhajan to Lee, no run length ball, pitching just outside off, big stride in as Lee defends
Harbhajan to Lee, no run Lee wasn't very convincing defended that, it turned a lot after pitching well outside off, gets an inside edge but no alarms
Harbhajan to Lee, no run uses his feet and defends
Harbhajan to Lee, no run big stride in as he blocks it to short leg
Harbhajan to Lee, no run tapped to silly mid-on
Khan to Watson, no run nice, tight line from Zaheer, Watson pushes it towards mid-off
Khan to Watson, no run length ball on off, confidently defended by Watson
Khan to Watson, no run overpitched and some width provided, Watson goes for the drive but doesn't time it and it rolls along to mid-off
Khan to Watson, no run shorter but wide again, Watson cuts it towards cover point
Khan to Watson, no run short ball well down the leg side, Watson thought about the pull but didn't go for it
Khan to Watson, no run Fires in the bouncer, much better direction, flies over Watson's head
Harbhajan to Johnson, no run fires in a flat delivery, 108 kmph, Johnson gets on the front foot and defends
Harbhajan to Johnson, no run tossed up this time, pitching on middle and Johnson blocks it off the front foot
Harbhajan to Johnson, no run slightly overpitched, not much turn on that one, Johnson taps it back to the bowler
Harbhajan to Johnson, no run flighted delivery, Johnson is beaten as that one held it line after pitching on middle
Harbhajan to Johnson, no run Johnson shows the full face of the bat as he blocks it
Mishra to Watson, no run length delivery, pitched on off, didn't turn much, Watson defends it to the bowler
Mishra to Watson, 1 run shorter and a bit wide, Watson rocks on to the back foot and punches it to the left of mid-off
Mishra to Johnson, 2 runs down the leg side to the left hander, who glances it for a couple
Mishra to Johnson, no run flighted delivery, pitching outside off, well left by Johnson
Mishra to Johnson, no run defended solidly by Johnson
Mishra to Johnson, no run more defence, this time to the leg side
Harbhajan to Watson, 2 runs length delivery, pitching just outside off, Watson opens the face to guide it towards third man
Harbhajan to Watson, no run nice loop for Harbhajan, Watson waits and defends off the back foot
Harbhajan to Watson, no run Watson shoulders arm to that one as it wide outside off
Harbhajan to Watson, no run defended back down the ground
Harbhajan to Watson, no run Watson comes down the track and defends it back to the bowler
Harbhajan to Watson, 4 leg byes fired in down the leg side, hits Watson's and races away fine for a boundary
Mishra to Johnson, no run round the wicket to the left hander, spins inwards as he shoulders arms
Mishra to Johnson, no run flighted outside off, he gets well forward and defends
Mishra to Johnson, no run flighted on off and middle, he gets forward and defends
Mishra to Johnson, no run tossed on middle, he gets forward on the walk and pushes it to midwicket
Mishra to Johnson, no run comes over the wicket, gives it more air, he pushes it to mid-on
Mishra to Johnson, no run slower through the air, he gets well forward and smothers the spin
Harbhajan to Watson, no run pitches a little wide outside off, not much turn as he shoulders arms
Harbhajan to Watson, 1 run good turn from the rough outside off, he picks it with the turn and works it to the on side, that's the 250
Harbhajan to Johnson, 1 run flatter through the air, he opens the face of the bat and glides it to short third man and takes a quick single
Harbhajan to Watson, no run floated on middle and leg, he pushes it to mid-on
Harbhajan to Watson, 1 run walks down the pitch and pushes a full delivery down to midwicket
Harbhajan to Johnson, no run comes round the wicket, the ball just goes through straight to Dhoni, Watson has the strike
Mishra to Watson, no run quick through the air, Watson gets well forward and the ball trickles to the on side
Mishra to Watson, no run steps down the track, checks his stroke and pushes it back to the bowler
Mishra to Watson, 1 run this was flatter and wider outside off, he rocks back and cuts to deep point
Mishra to Johnson, no run flighted on middle and off, he gets wel forward and defends
Mishra to Johnson, no run stays a bit on the backfoot, waits for the turn and tucks it to the on side
Mishra to Johnson, no run this one beats him, the wrong 'un, pokes his bat out to defend
Harbhajan to Watson, no run flighted slowly on off and middle, he gets back and defends
Harbhajan to Watson, no run quicker through the air, angled in towards middle and leg, he defends
Harbhajan to Watson, no run more flight this time and the angle is more to the off stump, pushes it back to the bowler
Harbhajan to Watson, no run slower through the air, he stays on the back foot and defend
Harbhajan to Watson, FOUR runs pushed in flatter and quicker, it sits up as a half tracker for Watson and he gets into the position for the pull early and smashes it past square leg
Harbhajan to Watson, no run gives it more air, pitches on middle and leg, he stays back and defends
Mishra to Johnson, no run flighted outside off, driven to the off side
Mishra to Johnson, no run flighted outside off, he drives firmly to the covers
Mishra to Johnson, no run comes round the wicket, lands on a full length on middle and off, he defends
Mishra to Johnson, no run not much turn, he closes the face of the bat as he defends
Mishra to Johnson, no run flighted outside off, defended uppishly to the silly point region
Mishra to Johnson, no run short and wide outside off, he waits on it, rocks back and cuts hard and strikes Laxman flush on the shin
Harbhajan to Watson, FOUR runs flighted outside off, he gives him the charge and crashes a full delivery wide of mid-off, lovely shot
Harbhajan to Watson, no run flighted on off and middle, he gets forward and defends
Harbhajan to Watson, no run slower through the air, he gets forward and nearly inside edges onto the pads
Harbhajan to Watson, no run flighted just a little wide outside off, gets well forward and taps it away
Harbhajan to Watson, no run slower through the air, gets a half stride forward and defends
Harbhajan to Watson, 1 run takes a few paces forward and pushes it wide of mid-off for a single
Mishra to Watson, no run flighted outside off, he gets forward and defends
Mishra to Siddle, no run defends very close to the his pad and gets a thin inside edge
Mishra to Siddle, no run this one keeps low and turns, Siddle was all at sea on the forward defence
Mishra to Siddle, no run a big spinning googly, pitches on middle and turns sharply past the back of Siddle
Mishra to Siddle, no run lunges forward to defend and there appears to be an edge onto his pads, close shout for leg before and Mishra appeals confidently, not sure about the edge
Harbhajan to Johnson, no run flighted outside off, he gets forward and defends to the off side
Harbhajan to Johnson, no run slower through the air, goes through straight and beats the bat
Harbhajan to Johnson, no run flighted outside off, gets forward and smothers the turn
Harbhajan to Johnson, no run Johnson shoulders arms outside off, the ball goes through straight
Harbhajan to Johnson, SIX runs into the crowd! Harbhajan tempts him with flight and he obliges by waltzing down the track and banging it over the region of long-on
Harbhajan to Johnson, no run shuffles across his stumps and turns it to the on side
Mishra to Siddle, no run straighter, flatter one pitching on off, Siddle gets behind the line and defends
Mishra to Siddle, no run Siddle tries to work it through the leg side, gets a leading edge towards the bowler
Mishra to Siddle, no run big legspinner, Siddle gets on the front foot, looks to dives but is comprehensively beaten
To nobody's surprise, India have decided to not enforce the follow-on.
Mishra becomes the sixth India bowler to take a five-for on debut and India now have a 201-run cushion.
